sn44.6:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto, ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn44.6:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma mahakotthiko tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakotthikena saddhim sammodi.
sn44.6:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn44.6:1.4: “‘kim nu kho, avuso kotthika, hoti tathagato param marana’ti …pe…
sn44.6:1.5: ‘kim panavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttho samano:
sn44.6:1.7: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.6:1.8: Ko nu kho, avuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.6:2.1: “Ruparamassa kho, avuso, ruparatassa rupasammuditassa rupanirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti;
sn44.6:2.3: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti;
sn44.6:2.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:2.5: Vedanaramassa kho, avuso, vedanaratassa vedanasammuditassa, vedananirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:2.8: vinnanaramassa kho, avuso, vinnanaratassa vinnanasammuditassa vinnananirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:2.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:3.1: Na ruparamassa kho, avuso, na ruparatassa na rupasammuditassa, rupanirodham janato passato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:3.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:3.6: na vinnanaramassa kho, avuso, na vinnanaratassa na vinnanasammuditassa, vinnananirodham janato passato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:3.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:3.8: Ayam kho, avuso, hetu, ayam paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
sn44.6:4.1: “Siya panavuso, annopi pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.6:4.3: Bhavaramassa kho, avuso, bhavaratassa bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:4.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:4.5: Na bhavaramassa kho, avuso, na bhavaratassa na bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodham janato passato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:4.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:4.7: Ayampi kho, avuso, pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
sn44.6:5.1: “Siya panavuso, annopi pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.6:5.3: Upadanaramassa kho, avuso, upadanaratassa upadanasammuditassa, upadananirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:5.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:5.5: Na upadanaramassa kho, avuso, na upadanaratassa na upadanasammuditassa, upadananirodham janato passato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:5.6: ‘neva, hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:5.7: Ayampi kho, avuso, pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
sn44.6:6.1: “Siya panavuso, annopi pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.6:6.3: Tanharamassa kho, avuso, tanharatassa tanhasammuditassa, tanhanirodham ajanato apassato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:6.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:6.5: Na tanharamassa kho, avuso, na tanharatassa na tanhasammuditassa, tanhanirodham janato passato yathabhutam, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:6.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:6.7: Ayampi kho, avuso, pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
sn44.6:7.1: “Siya panavuso, annopi pariyayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.6:7.2: “Ettha dani, avuso sariputta, ito uttari kim icchasi?
sn44.6:7.3: Tanhasankhayavimuttassa, avuso sariputta, bhikkhuno vattam natthi pannapanaya”ti.
